title: Fine-Tuning Workshop 2
text:
Full fine-tune vs LoRA

At this point of time, full fine-tune is rarely used. LoRA is preferred as it significantly reduces the number of parameters to be trained.








Research thought



Can we have an adapter and we can somehow find ways to evaluate that adapter from a perspective of free recall?
